original_title: Brendan Grace: It's A Great Laugh
overview: Comedy performance from popular Irish stand-up Brendan Grace. Grace, now celebrating 40 years as an entertainer, was originally a musician, but when his band was struggling in the face of a hostile crowd he took to the stage solo and found his true vocation. He has since become known for his character sketches and humorous take on everyday life.
tagline: Brendan Grace : It's a Great Laugh
title: Brendan Grace: It's A Great Laugh
